biography: Olli is a seasoned competitor at the Hector Trophée, representing Hirsala Golf with distinction. Known for his meticulous approach to the game and unwavering focus, Olli has secured one Hector Trophée victory and claimed one Victor Trophy, demonstrating his capabilities in both team and individual formats.

Off the course, Olli is known to be a deep thinker, often seen analyzing course maps and strategizing his next move with intense concentration. His dedication to improvement is only matched by his love for golf and his admiration for Bryson DeChambeau, whom he considers an inspiration.

With eight past appearances, Olli will participate for the ninth time in Hector Trophée 2025. His extensive experience and strategic mind make him a formidable opponent, and he undoubtedly will aim to leverage his past successes to secure another title.
